title: Godrej Capital to enter affordable housing loan segment, eyes AUM of Rs 17,000 cr by Dec-end
description: Godrej Capital, the financial services arm of the Godrej Group, plans to enter the affordable housing loan segment and aims to grow its assets under management to Rs 17,000 crore by 2024. The company targets Rs 30,000 crore by March 2026 and Rs 50,000 crore by March 2028.
